nobble.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make someone do what you want by illegally offering them money or threatening them
nobble.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The jury had been nobbled and the case had to be reheard.
nobble.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to prevent a horse from winning a race, especially by giving it drugs
nobble.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to get someone’s attention, especially in order to persuade them to do something
nobble.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: I was nobbled by my deaf old aunt and couldn’t get away.
